description: A sinister scythe that appears to swallow light, honed with an edge that rends the soul.
A set of gauntlets with elongated obsidian talons that feast on the life force of foes.
A whip made from twisted shadows, stinging with the pain of the netherworld.
A dagger with a blade that flickers between realms, slicing through flesh and spirit alike.
A mace that embodies darkness, eclipsing light with each devastating blow.
A lance that leaks a malevolent aura, piercing through defenses with a touch of dread.
A flail that causes wounds seeping with the essence of nightmares, ensuring unrest.
A hammer forged from cursed stones of ancient tombs, bringing desolation with each swing.
A blade that wails with the torment of trapped souls, cutting deeper than flesh.
A fiery fang extracted from a demonic beast, scalding foes with infernal heat.
A dark crystal that leeches vitality from foes while imbuing allies with stolen life force.
A censer oozing with noxious fumes that wilt enemies and rejuvenate allies with each swing.
A staff that curses foes with weakening hexes while reinforcing the caster's vitality.
A sceptre that saps the essence of one's enemy to mend the wielder's wounds.
A lantern that shines with a ghastly light, draining life to restore it elsewhere.
An ancient tome from which soft whispers emanate, wrapping the reader in a cocoon of healing words.
A luminescent amulet pulsating with a gentle cadence, knitting together soul and flesh.
A wand that radiates with the glow of a heartbeat, synchronizing with the life force to regenerate wounds.
An orb enveloped in a halo of dark blossoms, each petal's fall bestows rejuvenation.
A rod that channels a vortex of souls, siphoning their essence to restore the living.
An inscribed sigil that hums with a shield-reinforcing resonance, mending metal and magic alike.
A smoldering incense whose smoke weaves into armor, solidifying into an invisible, restorative layer.
A runestone that emits a spectral shield, caressing worn armor with a restorative glow.
A crystal that resonates with the echo of ancient chants, its vibrations knitting together cracked shields.
A conduit that pulses with a rhythmical aura, synchronizing with and mending the bearer's armor points.
A sinister scepter that unleashes unpredictable surges of dark energy, as likely to harm as to hinder.
A pair of dark orbs that resonate with each other, amplifying both healing and harm in their vicinity.
A totem that emits a fearsome wail, strengthening allies at the cost of unpredictable backlash.
A gnarled staff that sprouts vampiric seeds, draining a foe to rejuvenate its wielder.
A prism that binds to an adversary's shadow, sapping their essence with each pulse.
An engraved sigil that absorbs the life force of defeated enemies, converting it into healing energy.
A golden sceptre topped with a benevolent crystal, radiating waves of healing sanctity.
A silver goblet encrusted with sapphires, overflowing with water that cleanses wounds with a touch.
A rune that glows with a soft luminescence, enveloping the injured in a restorative embrace.
A charm that pulsates with a tranquil aura, its calmness mending the bearer's ailments.
A tome bound in white leather, its pages fluttering to the rhythm of the heart, sealing cuts and curing poisons.
